titleStmt.title: Vincentius redivivus, a funeral sermon preached Octob. 27, 1678 upon the occasion of the much bewailed death of that reverend and eminent servant of Christ, Mr. Thomas Vincent ... / by Samuel Slater.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst and T. Cockerill,
